languages.text: Reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by −2 for their next 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until their next turn.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Решимость{/g} цели уменьшается на 2 на 2 ее следующих {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Также цели необходимо пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала она оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлена{/g} до своего следующего хода.

traits.locale_text: Reduces resolve by -2 for 2 turns. The targets also must pass a Willpower resistance test or become staggered for 1 turn.

Reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by −2 for their next 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until their next turn.

languages.text: Verringert die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Ziels in seinen nächsten 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zügen{/g} um −2. Das Ziel muss zudem eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder es {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumelt{/g} bis zu seinem nächsten Zug.
languages.original_text: Reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by −2 for their next 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} um -2 für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Züge{/g}. Die Ziele müssen außerdem eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} schaffen, oder sie {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumeln{/g} für 1 Zug.

languages.text: Réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de la cible de −2 pour les 2 prochains {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}. La cible doit également réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} jusqu'à son prochain tour.
languages.original_text: Reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by −2 for their next 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de -2 pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}. Les cibles doivent également réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}, faute de quoi elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 tour.

languages.text: 使目标{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}降低2点，持续2{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续1回合。
